description:
Sometimes you’re on a trail, sometimes you’re forging your own trails. Built for all-day comfort, these snowshoes are made for efficient travel and can also handle off-trail exploring. Heel lifts give you a boost on climbs, and extra rigidity built into the nose supports your strong kicksteps into the slope.

  • ExoTract deck has steel around the perimeter for traction, and plastic as the deck material for flexibility and great performance in the cold
  • Updated HyperLink adjustable binding system has an intuitive and fast ratchet system that accommodates a wide range of boot sizes
  • EVA foam cushioned binding cradle eliminates pressure points
  • Pivot crampons are a single piece with 2 points for traction
  • Ergo Televator heel lifts reduce fatigue and improve traction while climbing, and are easily engaged with your pole
  • Compatible with MSR Revo Tails (sold separately) when you need additional flotation for heavier loads or less supportive snow
name: MSR Revo Explore Snowshoes - Men's
